alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains; San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 22 at 9:18PM PST until November 25 at 1:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM WEDNESDAY TO 1 PM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...San Diego County Valleys, Riverside County Mountains, San Diego County Mountains including I-8, and also on I- 10 through the San Gorgonio Pass. * WHEN...From 9 PM Wednesday to 1 PM Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The combination of strong winds, low relative humidity and warm weather will result in several hours of critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Riverside County Mountains; San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning
